title: (x) 'NCL' wide caps - Eurostile {Simon}
content:
Hi, My first time on here

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202040603im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NCL-test-2_5928.gif)

Any idea what font this is, I've tried what's the font and identi-font without success. Have a feeling the font has been stretched? - Need to recreate this logo

Any help much appreciated.

Thanks

Brian
author: helpmeplease

comments.content:
Hi Brian,  
I think that's Eurostile Bold Extended with a particularly violent case of 'squooshing'.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile/bold-extended-2-63893/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202040603/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile/bold-extended-2-63893/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile/bold-extended-2-63893/")

Hi Sihep,

You are a star!

- Thank you for your help

Have a good weekend

Brian
